ðŸ“– Summary: Saber is a cross-platform, open-source handwriting notes application designed for simplicity and intuitive use. It offers unique features such as note inversion for comfortable dark mode usage, a dual-password system for enhanced security, and a highlighting tool that avoids common rendering issues. Saber allows users to organize notes with nested folders and is available on various platforms, including Android, iOS, Linux, Windows, and macOS.
